snippet.title: THE CREW 2 : Launch Trailer | Ubisoft
snippet.description:
Get your Gold Edition and play now : http://ubi.li/p59pp

Gather your crew and start your journey through Motornation ! Get followers, build your reputation,  become the best pilote ever.

The Race never stops, Fun has no end. Many exciting challenges awaits you ! Cars, motocross, planes & boats, you've got it all to climb your way to the top !  


The Crew 2 will be available on PS4, Xbox One, and PC.

Stay tuned for more videos !

Follow us on social media!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thecrewgame.uk/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheCrewGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thecrewgame/
